last_episode_to_air.name: Galileo's New Memory
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Troopers have to rescue a new robot from Grimlord who wants to steal its memory.

name: VR Troopers
overview: Join the VR troopers as they use `Virtual Reality' to stop the evil GrimLord creating havoc.

episodes.name: The Battle Begins (1)
episodes.overview: On their way to meet Professor Hart, Ryan, Kaitlin and J.B. are attacked from the air by Air Striker and Fighterbot and on the ground by Skugs.

episodes.name: The Battle Begins (2)
episodes.overview: Kaitlin and J.B. locate Ryan in the quarry and hurry to his rescue. After a Skug fight, he is brought back to the lab and repaired.

episodes.name: Error in the System
episodes.overview: Grimlord crashes the lab's computer system to retrieve the secret of Mass Inter-Reality Travel. The Troopers call an ambush by Skugs.

episodes.name: Lost Memories
episodes.overview: The kids try to help a homeless lady with amnesia. Tao cooks, students pass out flyers, and Kaitlin runs the woman's photo in the newspaper.

episodes.name: Battle for the Books
episodes.overview: Ziktor wants to destroy all books that teach about solar energy. He starts with Mr. Reese's bookmobile, as a way of getting at J.B.

episodes.name: Oh Brother
episodes.overview: Ryan and J.B. are training two brothers who always argue. Ziktor/Grimlord decides to unleash two monster robot brothers of his own: the Swordbots.

episodes.name: Grimlord's Challenge
episodes.overview: A neighborhood policewoman offers Tao and the kids a challenge: turn Becky into a karate contender in two weeks and win $1,000.

episodes.name: Computer Captive
episodes.overview: While helping Kaitlin install a graphics program in her computer, J.B. gets sucked through the monitor and into Grimlord's dungeon.

episodes.name: Katlin's Little Helper
episodes.overview: Kaitlin's cousin aspires to be a reporter like Kaitlin, and while on a story, she discovers green slime oozing from the grass in the park.

episodes.name: The Virtual Spy
episodes.overview: Grimlord plants a spy in reality, an investigative reporter named Jeremy, whom Woody hires at the "Underground Voice Daily."

episodes.name: The Virtual V-6
episodes.overview: The guys build a pollution-free motorcycle engine in V.R. and put it in J.B.'s Skycycle.

episodes.name: No One's Friend
episodes.overview: Ziktor sends a Skug to the dojo disguised as a martial arts student who spars with J.B. and transfers to him an electrical charge.

episodes.name: Dogmatic Change
episodes.overview: Grimlord comes up with the idea of turning dog pound pets (and more) into rabid mutant monsters for his own army.

episodes.name: Searching for Tyler Steele
episodes.overview: Kaitlin takes a photo of a strange building and spots a man in a room with bars on the windows sitting next to a strange "S" symbol on the wall.

episodes.name: Save the Trees
episodes.overview: Grimlord (aka Ziktor) needs an old-growth forest cleared for a massive breakthrough from Virtual Reality.

episodes.name: A Dirty Trick
episodes.overview: Grimlord sends his evil magician to abduct the real magician and catch the Troopers with their guard down.

episodes.name: Kaitlin's Front Page
episodes.overview: Kaitlin receives a tip on a big story: A top-secret weapons plant and testing site has been set up outside Cross World City.

episodes.name: The Dognapping
episodes.overview: Skugs dognap Jeb when he steps outside for a nature call. They take him to Grimlord, who is angered by the dog's wisecracking mouth.

episodes.name: My Dog's Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Jeb the dog is depressed because he's fallen for Princess the Dog and her puppies, but Princess's owner blocks their romance.

episodes.name: Digging for Fire
episodes.overview: Following an earthquake, the teens discover that someone is digging shafts to the center of the Earth under a downtown building.

episodes.name: The Great Brain Robbery
episodes.overview: In his scheme to take over the planet, Grimlord tries to use the preserved brain of the greatest tactical mind in history.

episodes.name: The Dojo Plot
episodes.overview: When Tao is informed that the dojo is on the verge of shutting down due to financial problems, Ryan, Kaitlin and J.B. organize a fundraiser.

episodes.name: Grimlord's Greatest Hits
episodes.overview: The teens are going to put on a dance-a-thon so that a student of theirs, Brandon, can afford to go to a special music academy.

episodes.name: The Disappearance
episodes.overview: Grimlord plots to overtake reality by making his mutants invisible. Meanwhile, Tao tries to teach the Troopers the importance of stealth in combat.

episodes.name: Nightmares
episodes.overview: Kaitlin starts having strange, vivid dreams about the power and invincibility of Grimlord's forces.

episodes.name: Secret Admirer
episodes.overview: Kaitlin receives flowers from a secret admirer -- Grimlord! Col. Icebot is developing evil flowers to capture and destroy the Troopers.

episodes.name: Grimlord's House of Fear
episodes.overview: Col. Icebot penetrates the reality barrier with an ionic cyber beam, and Grimlord wants him to build a robot to open the reality barrier.

episodes.name: Three Strikes
episodes.overview: J.B. coaches one of two rival baseball teams for a benefit game to raise money to upgrade the field and secure the lease.

episodes.name: Danger in the Deep
episodes.overview: Taking a virtual tour of a dam they've been told is polluted, the teens find a radio signal coming from under the dam itself.

episodes.name: Small But Mighty
episodes.overview: Grimlord sends a package to the dojo. When it's opened, Ryan, Kaitlin and J.B. are exposed to a strange ray that turns them into children.

episodes.name: Defending Dark Heart (1)
episodes.overview: The Troopers and Professor Hart discover that one of Grimlord's mutants actually possesses human DNA!

episodes.name: Defending Dark Heart (2)
episodes.overview: Dark Heart, about to be executed by Grimlord's Mutants, uses Toxoid as a shield and escapes while Ryan fights Skugs.

episodes.name: Defending Dark Heart (3)
episodes.overview: A Skug learns of the V.R. Troopers' plans to de-virtualize Ryan's father and warns Grimlord.

episodes.name: Defending Dark Heart (4)
episodes.overview: Grimlord, knowing Dark Heart/Tyler is gravely injured, launches a full aerial assault on Professor Hart's lab.

episodes.name: Ghost Biker
episodes.overview: Ziktor receives some good news: Gen. Ivar has found a weakened area of the reality barrier, and Col. Icebot has developed a new weapon.

episodes.name: Endangered Species
episodes.overview: Kaitlin's friend Danielle beseeches her to write a story about the Animal Sanctuary, where Danielle's father is head scientist.

episodes.name: Field Goal
episodes.overview: When the junior high football coach stumbles onto Grimlord's secret base, Skugs shrink him and imprison him in a sports trading card.

episodes.name: The Littlest Trooper
episodes.overview: Skugs kidnap Baby Boo from his parents in the park and leave the baby on the dojo doorstep.

episodes.name: The Reality Virus
episodes.overview: Gen. Ivar and Col. Icebot stage a battle with the V.R. Troopers in virtual reality in order to infect them with a Reality Virus.

episodes.name: Friends in Need
episodes.overview: Two circus performers who are scientists in disguise are taken to Professor Hart for help in completing their research on a fuel-increasing formula.

episodes.name: Good Trooper, Bad Trooper
episodes.overview: Kaitlin is doing an article on biologically dissimilar twins. Meanwhile, Ziktor has developed a cloning device.

episodes.name: The Transmutant
episodes.overview: J.B. spars with Ryan in an effort to relax before taking a test to qualify for a scholarship.

episodes.name: Who's King of the Mountain?
episodes.overview: J.B. agrees to help his South American "e-mail pal," Jose, with some research on data involving an extinct volcano that has been strangely vibrating.

episodes.name: The Couch Potato Kid
episodes.overview: Ricky, Tao's visiting nephew, is a couch potato. The kids are planning an obstacle course and they try to get Ricky involved.

episodes.name: The Old Switcharoo
episodes.overview: Grimlord steals Dr. Unger's transforming device, hoping to take the powers of the V.R. Troopers for his army.

episodes.name: Race to the Rescue
episodes.overview: Ryan, Kaitlin and J.B. decide to help out a kid who's being bullied at a go-cart track.

episodes.name: Fiddler on the Loose
episodes.overview: Kaitlin's cousin from Ireland and his band are in town to perform a benefit concert to help raise awareness concerning the environment.

episodes.name: Virtually Powerless
episodes.overview: While at an arcade, J.B., Ryan and Kaitlin are visited by a mysterious man who suggests they play the newest game in the store, "Dark Odyssey."

episodes.name: New Kids on the Planet
episodes.overview: Ryan, Kaitlin and J.B. are camping in the wilderness when a streak of light and a thunderous crash alert them to the arrival of an alien spaceship.

episodes.name: Message from Space
episodes.overview: Professor Hart contacts Ryan, Kaitlin, and J.B. at the Underground to relay a message to Ryan from Dr. Monroe.

episodes.name: The Rise of the Red Python (1)
episodes.overview: J.B. and Ryan rescue a stray kitten and take it to an animal shelter, where they meet Amy, a nice young girl with an interest in martial arts.

episodes.name: The Rise of the Red Python (2)
episodes.overview: J.B. is sent to fight the Red Python, which malfunctions mid-battle. Dr. Poindexter offers an extra retroformer to bring her back to normal.

episodes.name: Mutant Mutiny
episodes.overview: Amphibidor's mutiny against Grimlord to become master of Virtual Reality is redirected into an attack on the VR Troopers.

episodes.name: Trooper Out of Time
episodes.overview: Ziktor tries to destroy Ryan's past with a time machine.

episodes.name: Secret Power
episodes.overview: The Troopers show how to combat stage fright and stop a plot to steal energy from the Power Plant at the same time.

episodes.name: Quest for Power (1)
episodes.overview: The Troopers attempt to rescue Tyler from Grimlord's dungeon and the evil war lord's plan to steal all his knowledge.

episodes.name: Quest for Power (2)
episodes.overview: The Troopers are forced to infiltrate Grimlord's dungeon in their efforts to rescue Tyler.

episodes.name: Quest for Power (3)
episodes.overview: Ryan loses his VR powers as he tries to rescue his father and the other Troopers.

episodes.name: Quest for Power (4)
episodes.overview: Tyler attempts to create a new virtual armor to defend the Troopers against Grimlord's new army in outer space.

episodes.name: Quest for Power (5)
episodes.overview: Tyler's new technology is put to the test when Grimlord has a new mutant created to destroy the Troopers.

episodes.name: Fashion Victims
episodes.overview: Ziktor uses a fashion show as an opportunity to try to catch the Troopers in his silk "capture" cocoons.

episodes.name: Game Over
episodes.overview: Grimlord launches the Troopers' new video training game into a real battleground and forces the Troopers to face their most awesome opponent ever.

episodes.name: Watered Down
episodes.overview: Ryan is trapped underwater by Octobot and is unable to use his powers to save himself.

episodes.name: The Negative Factor
episodes.overview: Ryan rushes to try to save J.B. and Kaitlin who are headed for The Negative Zone after being zapped by the Doom Master into phantoms on Earth.

episodes.name: Kaitlin Through the Looking Glass (1)
episodes.overview: Grimlord steals Kaitlin's image to create an Anti-Kaitlin programmed to destroy the VR Troopers.

episodes.name: Kaitlin Through the Looking Glass (2)
episodes.overview: Grimlord's creation, the Anti-Kaitlin, turns against him, and steals his Virtual Mirror Program to help reunite the two Kaitlins.

episodes.name: Kaitlin Goes Hollywood
episodes.overview: Kaitlin is forced to choose between the VR Troopers and a movie career as Grimlord creates Photobot to destroy them.

episodes.name: Grimlord Takes Root
episodes.overview: Grimlord's killer plants come alive and destroy the Troopers' motorcycles as they plan on taking over the Earth.

episodes.name: The Disk
episodes.overview: Grimlord tries to steal new scientific computer programs which threaten the Troopers' powers.

episodes.name: Virtual Venom
episodes.overview: J.B. and Kaitlin face old age before their time after Doom Master's Virtual Spider bites them.

episodes.name: New World Order
episodes.overview: Ryan falls victim to a mind-control motorcycle helmet and threatens Kaitlin's safety.

episodes.name: Grimlord's Children
episodes.overview: Grimlord attempts to enslave Ryan, Kaitlin and the play center kids with his magic balloons.

episodes.name: The Millennium Sabre
episodes.overview: The Troopers race to block Lizardbot's plan to destroy them using the stolen energized Millennium Sabre.

episodes.name: Grimlord's Dark Secret (1)
episodes.overview: Ancient digs unearth a portal to worlds unknown -- except by Grimlord!

episodes.name: Grimlord's Dark Secret (2)
episodes.overview: A pyramid in another time hides deadly secrets for the Troopers.

episodes.name: On the Wrong Track
episodes.overview: Grimlord sabotages athlete's gold medals in World Games with plans for global domination.

episodes.name: Forward into the Past
episodes.overview: Grimlord tries to banish all to prehistoric Earth using his magic time bracelets.

episodes.name: Into Oraclon's Web
episodes.overview: Ryan unknowingly falls for Alexis, a beautiful mutant, who tricks him into a trap.

episodes.name: Santa's Secret Trooper
episodes.overview: Otto, one of Santa's elves, rescues the Troopers in time for Christmas.

episodes.name: The Charmeeka Invasion
episodes.overview: A new type of pet transformers themselves into an invasion of monsters which threaten the whole town.

episodes.name: Dream Battle
episodes.overview: Grimlord traps the Troopers in a dream of his own making.

episodes.name: A Hard Day's Mutant
episodes.overview: Grimlord attempts to steal the musical talents of a popular young rock group.

episodes.name: Magnetic Attraction
episodes.overview: Oraclon creates a powerful magnet monster to destroy the VR Troopers.

episodes.name: Get Me to the Lab on Time
episodes.overview: Grimlord creates a powerful love potion for Kaitlin and Percy who plan their wedding.

episodes.name: Grimlord's Big Breakout
episodes.overview: Grimlord frees an evil convict and transforms him into an anti-Trooper weapon.

episodes.name: Field and Scream
episodes.overview: Knighttime launches a city attack while the Troopers are and Ziktor are on a nature trip.

episodes.name: The Duplitron Dilemma
episodes.overview: Grimlord's Duplitron machine multiples trouble for the Troopers.

episodes.name: Despera Strikes Back
episodes.overview: Despera sends her evil sister, Desponda, to be the secret weapon in Grimlord's plot to destroy the Troopers.

episodes.name: The Ghost of Cross World Forrest
episodes.overview: The Troopers stumble onto Grimlord's secret weapons factory and are caught in a deadly fog which keeps them from transforming.

episodes.name: Grimlord's Dummy
episodes.overview: Grimlord transformers a ventriloquist dummy into a life-size monster who attacks the Troopers.

episodes.name: Time Out
episodes.overview: The Troopers and Grimlord are forced to join forces against Knighttime who has stopped the Earth.

episodes.name: Galileo's New Memory
episodes.overview: The Troopers have to rescue a new robot from Grimlord who wants to steal its memory.
